mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT(accountno, aid, apasswd, aname, aprofile_img, aprofile_imgsave, aprofile_thum, aprofile_size, zipcode, address1, address2, atel, adate, agrade) VALUES (account_seq.nextval, #{aid}, #{apasswd}, #{aname}, #{aprofile_img}, #{aprofile_imgsave}, #{aprofile_thum}, #{aprofile_size}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{atel}, sysdate, #{agrade})
mapper.select: SELECT accountno, aid, apasswd, aname, aprofile_img, aprofile_imgsave, aprofile_thum, aprofile_size, zipcode, address1, address2, atel, adate, agrade FROM account ORDER BY agrade ASC, aid ASC

SELECT accountno, aid, apasswd, aname, aprofile_img, aprofile_imgsave, aprofile_thum, aprofile_size, zipcode, address1, address2, atel, adate, agrade FROM account
WHERE UPPER(aid) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(aname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(atel) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY accountno ASC

SELECT accountno, aid, apasswd, aname, aprofile_img, aprofile_imgsave, aprofile_thum, aprofile_size, zipcode, address1, address2, atel, adate, agrade, r FROM ( SELECT accountno, aid, apasswd, aname, aprofile_img, aprofile_imgsave, aprofile_thum, aprofile_size, zipcode, address1, address2, atel, adate, agrade, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT accountno, aid, apasswd, aname, aprofile_img, aprofile_imgsave, aprofile_thum, aprofile_size, zipcode, address1, address2, atel, adate, agrade FROM account
WHERE UPPER(aid) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(aname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(atel) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY accountno ASC ) )
WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}

SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM account
WHERE UPPER(aid) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(aname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(atel) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY accountno ASC
